<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
</HEAD>
<BODY BGCOLOR="#FFFFFF" LINK=BLUE  VLINK=PURPLE>
<BR>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>


<!-- COMMAND=ADD_BASECOLOR,"Black" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DEFAULTFONT,"font-family:times;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_TABLESHADECOLOR,"#CCEEFF" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_STABLERULES,"border-bottom:solid #000000 1.0pt;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DTABLERULES,"border-bottom:double #000000 2.25pt;" -->





<!-- COMMAND=ADD_SCRTABLERULES,"border-bottom:solid #000000 1.0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DCRTABLERULES,"border-bottom:double #000000 2.25pt;margin-bottom:0pt;" -->


</FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><B> Exhibit 10.42  </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B> AMENDMENT NO. 1 TO<BR>
ASSET PURCHASE AGREEMENT  </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Amendment to the Asset Purchase Agreement (this "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Amendment</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") is entered into among
Rosebud Mining Company, a Pennsylvania corporation ("</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Buyer</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"), Evergreen Energy&nbsp;Inc., a Delaware corporation
("</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Parent</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"), and Buckeye Industrial Mining&nbsp;Co., an Ohio corporation (the "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Company</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>," and together
with Parent, collectively, "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Sellers</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>," and each individually, a "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Seller</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"), as of the 29th&nbsp;day of
March, 2010. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>A. INTRODUCTION </FONT></P>

<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>1.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Buyer,
Parent and the Company have entered into an Asset Purchase Agreement, dated March&nbsp;12, 2010 (the
"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Agreement</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"), pursuant to which Sellers are selling to Buyer the assets used primarily in the operations of the Business upon the terms and conditions
set forth in the Agreement.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Buyer,
Parent and the Company desire to amend the Agreement as set forth herein in order to proceed to the Closing on an expedited basis.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>3.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Capitalized
terms not otherwise defined herein will be given the meanings set forth in the Agreement. </FONT></DD></DL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>B. AMENDMENTS </FONT></P>

<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>1.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Article&nbsp;8
of the Agreement will be amended in its entirety to read as follows: </FONT></DD></DL>
<UL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>"The
consummation of the transactions contemplated herein (the "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Closing</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") will take place on April&nbsp;1, 2010, and shall take place at the offices
of Calfee, Halter&nbsp;&amp; Griswold in Cleveland, Ohio or at such other time and place as to which Buyer and Sellers may agree in writing. The date on which the Closing actually occurs is referred to
herein as the "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Closing Date</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>." The transfers and deliveries described in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Article&nbsp;7</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> shall be
mutually interdependent and shall be regarded as occurring simultaneously, and, any other provision of this Agreement notwithstanding, no such transfer or delivery shall become effective or shall be
deemed to have occurred until all of the other transfers and deliveries provided for in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Article&nbsp;7</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> shall also have occurred or been waived in
writing by the party entitled to waive the same. Such transfers and deliveries shall be deemed to have occurred and the Closing shall be effective as of 12:00:01&nbsp;a.m. on the Closing Date." </FONT></P>

</UL>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Notwithstanding
anything to the contrary in the Agreement, Buyer waives any failure on behalf of Parent or the Company to deliver any of the authorizations,
approvals or consents set forth in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;5.4</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> of the Disclosure Letter from each third party with respect to any Contract listed thereon that,
as of March&nbsp;31, 2010, have not been secured by Parent or the Company and, accordingly and to that extent, waives the Closing condition set forth in Section&nbsp;7.1(a)(ii).
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>3.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Section&nbsp;7.1(d)(iii)
of the Agreement will be amended in its entirety to read as follows: </FONT></DD></DL>
<UL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>"7.1(d)(iii)(A)
On the Closing Date, each of Buyer and the Company and/ or Parent, as applicable, shall execute and deliver to the other party the following instruments with respect to the Real
Property, other than the Owned Real Property: </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(x)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;an
Assignment and Assumption of Lease for each Surface Lease and Mineral Lease listed in Section&nbsp;2.1(a)(ii) of the Disclosure Letter; </FONT></P>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(y)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;an
Assignment and Assumption of each Easement, License and other Agreement affecting the Real Property listed in Section&nbsp;5.10(a) of the Disclosure Letter; and </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(z)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;an
Assignment and Assumption of Lease for each Lessor Lease listed in Section&nbsp;5.10(b) of the Disclosure Letter; </FONT></P>

</UL>
<HR NOSHADE>
<P style='font-family:times;page-break-before:always'></p>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=1,EFW="2197697",CP="EVERGREEN ENERGY INC.",DN="5",CHK=312001,FOLIO='blank',FILE='DISK130:[09ZEM2.09ZEM48202]JM48202A.;5',USER='MBRADT',CD='31-MAR-2010;15:10' -->
<A NAME="page_jm48202_1_2"> </A>
<UL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(B)&nbsp;&nbsp;On
the Closing Date, for each parcel of Owned Real Property for which the Company has obtained from Chicago Title Insurance Company a verifying tax map and conforming,
record legal description matching such tax map and not marked insufficient for transfer under the applicable County's local conveyancing standards, the Company shall deliver to Buyer a general
warranty deed for such parcel of Owned Real Property, free and clear of Liens other than Permitted Liens. For all other parcels of Owned Real Property, on the Closing Date, each of Buyer and Company
shall execute and deliver to the other party an interim ground lease (the "Ground Lease") whereby the Company leases to Buyer, and Buyer leases from the Company, all other parcels of the Owned Real
Property for a term of twenty nine (29)&nbsp;years after the Closing Date, for a cumulative annual base rent of $1 in aggregate, with Buyer paying all real estate taxes and assessments, charges and
levies associated with the Owned Real Property that become payable after the Closing Date, with Buyer insuring all improvements thereon at full replacement value, and Buyer maintaining all such
improvements in compliance with applicable law, and otherwise on an absolute, net-net-net basis."  </FONT></P>

</UL>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>4.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Section&nbsp;7.1(d)(viii)
of the Agreement is hereby deleted in its entirety.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>5.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Section&nbsp;7.2(f)
of the Agreement will be amended in its entirety to read as follows: "Buyer shall have initiated all actions necessary to replace all
of the Company's deposits and bonds, including but not limited to the reclamation, utility, payment and performance bonds, and equipment bonds and deposits listed in </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;5.10(p)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> of the
Disclosure Letter attached hereto; and"
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>6.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Section&nbsp;11.11
of the Agreement will be amended to add a new subsection&nbsp;(b) to read as follows: "To the extent not completed as of the Closing
Date, within sixty (60)&nbsp;days after the Closing Date, Buyer shall have replaced all of the Company's deposits and bonds, including but not limited to the reclamation, utility, payment and
performance bonds, and equipment bonds and deposits listed in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;5.10(p)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> of the Disclosure Letter attached hereto and shall have caused the
bonds and deposits of the Company to be released at such time." Accordingly, Section&nbsp;11.11 of the Agreement will be further amended to change the current subsection&nbsp;(b) to
subsection&nbsp;(c).
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>7.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>A
new Section&nbsp;11.13 will be added to the Agreement to read as follows: </FONT></DD></DL>
<UL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>"11.13
</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Boundary Surveys: Deeds</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. After the Closing Date, at Sellers' expense, Sellers shall cause (i)&nbsp;new boundary surveys to be prepared by
licensed surveyors selected by Sellers for the approximately 20 parcels of Owned Real Property located in Columbiana County and Jefferson County whose record legal descriptions do not comply with the
local County conveyancing standards, and cause such boundary survey legal descriptions to be approved by the applicable County officials, and (ii)&nbsp;obtain tax maps and other title company
verification of the record legal descriptions of all other parcels of Owned Real Property (to the extent not previously obtained by the Company pursuant to Section&nbsp;7.1(d)(iii)(B) above.
Promptly after Sellers complete their post closing obligations under this Section&nbsp;11.13, Seller shall convey the Owned Real Property to Buyer by general warranty deeds, pay the Ohio conveyance
fee tax for Buyer to file such deeds of record (calculated using the existing fair market values shown on the current tax duplicates for such Owned Real Property), whereupon the parties shall
terminate the Ground Lease."  </FONT></P>

</UL>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>8.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>A
new Section&nbsp;11.14 will be added to the Agreement to read as follows: </FONT></DD></DL>
<UL>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>"11.14
</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Further Assurances</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. From time to time after the Closing, as and when requested by any party hereto without any fee other than payment of such
party's out-of-pocket expenses, any other party shall execute and deliver, or cause to be executed and delivered, all such documents and instruments and shall take, or cause to
be taken, all such further or other actions as the requesting party may reasonably deem necessary or desirable to evidence and effectuate the transactions contemplated by this Agreement." </FONT></P>

</UL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>2</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<P style='font-family:times;page-break-before:always'></p>
<!-- ZEQ.=2,SEQ=2,EFW="2197697",CP="EVERGREEN ENERGY INC.",DN="5",CHK=324616,FOLIO='2',FILE='DISK130:[09ZEM2.09ZEM48202]JM48202A.;5',USER='MBRADT',CD='31-MAR-2010;15:10' -->
<A NAME="page_jm48202_1_3"> </A>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>C. MISCELLANEOUS </FONT></P>

<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>1.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><I>Terms of the Agreement</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. The terms of the Agreement, as expressly amended pursuant to this Amendment, will
remain in full force and effect.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><I>Contract Interpretation and Governing Law</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance
with the Laws of the State of Ohio, without regard to the choice-of-laws or conflicts-of-law's provisions thereof.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>3.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><I>Headings</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. The article and section headings used in this Amendment are intended solely for convenience of
reference, do not themselves form&nbsp;a part of this Amendment and may not be given effect in the interpretation or construction of this Amendment.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>4.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><I>Counterparts</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. This Amendment may be executed in two or more counterparts, all of which will be considered one
and the same instrument and will become effective when one or more counterparts have been signed by each of the parties and delivered to the other party, it being understood that all parties need not
sign the same counterpart. </FONT></DD></DL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>*****
</FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>3</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<P style='font-family:times;page-break-before:always'></p>

<A NAME="page_jm48202_1_4"> </A>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Intending
to be legally bound, the undersigned have executed and delivered this Amendment as of the date first above written. </FONT></P>

<A NAME="toc_ke48202_2"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>  DEFICIENCY OF EARNINGS TO FIXED CHARGES    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Our earnings were sufficient to cover fixed charges for each of the periods presented. Accordingly, the following table sets forth the
deficiency of earnings to fixed charges for each of the periods presented. Because of the deficiency, ratio information is not applicable. </FONT></P>
 <DIV style="padding:0pt;position:relative;width:80%;margin-left:10%;">
<p style="font-family:times;"><font size=1></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>

 <P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;For
purposes of computing the deficiency of earnings available to cover fixed charges, fixed charges represent interest expense, the portion of operating lease rental expense that is
considered by us to be representative of interest and amortization of discount related to indebtedness. Deficiency of earnings consists of loss before income taxes, plus fixed charges. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>KFx
Technology,&nbsp;LLC*&#151;a Delaware limited liability company </FONT></P>

Operations,&nbsp;LLC*&#151;a Delaware limited liability company. </FONT></P>

Development Company&#151;a South Dakota company 100% owned by Evergreen Operations,&nbsp;LLC </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Evergreen
Energy International,&nbsp;LLC*&#151;a Delaware limited liability company. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Evergreen
Energy Asia Pacific Corp&#151;a Delaware company 96% owned by Evergreen Energy International,&nbsp;LLC </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Evergreen
Energy Asia Corporation&#151;a Japanese company 100% owned by Evergreen Energy&nbsp;Inc. </FONT></P>


<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>C-Lock
Technology,&nbsp;Inc.&#151;a Delaware company 92% owned by Evergreen Energy&nbsp;Inc. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="RIGHT" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>


<!-- COMMAND=ADD_BASECOLOR,"Black" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DEFAULTFONT,"font-family:times;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_TABLESHADECOLOR,"#CCEEFF" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_STABLERULES,"border-bottom:solid #000000 1.0pt;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DTABLERULES,"border-bottom:double #000000 2.25pt;" -->

<P ALIGN="RIGHT" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="kg48201_exhibit_23.1"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_kg48201_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>  Exhibit&nbsp;23.1    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="kg48201_consent_of_independent__kg402317"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_kg48201_2"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>  CONSENT OF INDEPENDENT REGISTERED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;We consent to the incorporation by reference in Registration Statements on Form&nbsp;S-8
(Nos.&nbsp;333-09873, 333-82357, 333-106129, 333-129447 and 333-130336) and Registration Statements on Form&nbsp;S-3
(Nos.&nbsp;333-163246, 333-162720, 333-04298, 333-87774, 333-106207 and 333-12181) of our reports dated March&nbsp;31, 2010,
relating to the financial statements of Evergreen Energy&nbsp;Inc. and subsidiaries (the "Company"),(which report expresses an unqualified opinion and includes an explanatory paragraph regarding
substantial doubt about the Company's ability to continue as a going concern) and the effectiveness of Company's internal control over financial reporting(which report expresses an adverse opinion on
the effectiveness of the Company's internal control over financial reporting because of a material weakness), appearing in the Annual Report on Form&nbsp;10-K of Evergreen
Energy&nbsp;Inc. for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2009. </FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>/s/
Deloitte&nbsp;&amp; Touche&nbsp;LLP<BR>
Denver, Colorado<BR>
March&nbsp;31, 2010 </FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<P style='font-family:times;page-break-before:always'></p>

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-31.1
<SEQUENCE>9
<FILENAME>a2197697zex-31_1.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EXHIBIT 31.1
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
</HEAD>
<BODY BGCOLOR="#FFFFFF" LINK=BLUE  VLINK=PURPLE>
<BR>
<FONT SIZE=3 ><A HREF="#09ZEM48201_9">QuickLinks</A></FONT>
<font size=3> -- Click here to rapidly navigate through this document</font>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>


<!-- COMMAND=ADD_BASECOLOR,"Black" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DEFAULTFONT,"font-family:times;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_TABLESHADECOLOR,"#CCEEFF" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_STABLERULES,"border-bottom:solid #000000 1.0pt;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DTABLERULES,"border-bottom:double #000000 2.25pt;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_SCRTABLERULES,"border-bottom:solid #000000 1.0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DCRTABLERULES,"border-bottom:double #000000 2.25pt;margin-bottom:0pt;" -->


 </FONT></P>

<!-- TOC_END -->
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="ki48201_exhibit_31.1"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_ki48201_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>  EXHIBIT 31.1    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="ki48201_certification_pursuant_to_sect__cer02454"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_ki48201_2"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>  CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO<BR>  SECTION&nbsp;302 OF<BR>  THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF&nbsp;2002    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>I,
Thomas H. Stoner, Jr., certify that: </FONT></P>

<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>1.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>I
have reviewed this annual report on Form&nbsp;10-K of Evergreen Energy&nbsp;Inc.:
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Based
on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements
made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>3.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Based
on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the
financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the company as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>4.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>The
company's other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act
Rules&nbsp;13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f))
for the company and have:
<BR><BR></FONT>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(a)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Designed
such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that
material information relating to the company, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being
prepared;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(b)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Designed
such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to
provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting
principles;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(c)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Evaluated
the effectiveness of the company's disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the
disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(d)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Disclosed
in this report any change in the company's internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the company's most recent fiscal quarter
(the company's fourth quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the company's internal control over financial reporting; and
<BR><BR></FONT></DD></DL>
</DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>5.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>The
company's other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the
company's auditors and the audit committee of the company's board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
<BR><BR></FONT>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(a)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>All
significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to
adversely affect the company's ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(b)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Any
fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the company's internal control over financial
reporting. </FONT></DD></DL>
</DD></DL>
 <DIV style="padding:0pt;position:relative;width:80%;margin-left:10%;">
<p style="font-family:times;"><font size=1></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>


<!-- COMMAND=ADD_TABLEWIDTH,"100%" -->


 </FONT></P>

<TR VALIGN="BOTTOM">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>/s/ </FONT><FONT SIZE=2>THOMAS H. STONER, JR.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><BR>


<HR NOSHADE SIZE="1.0pt" WIDTH="100%" COLOR="#000000">

</FONT> <FONT SIZE=2> Thomas H. Stoner, Jr.<BR>
Title: Chief Executive Officer<BR>
Date: March 31, 2010<BR></FONT>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>

<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>  EXHIBIT 31.2    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="kk48201_certification_pursuant_to_sect__cer02454"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_kk48201_2"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>  CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO<BR>  SECTION&nbsp;302 OF<BR>  THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF&nbsp;2002    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>I,
Diana L. Kubik, certify that: </FONT></P>

<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>1.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>I
have reviewed this annual report on Form&nbsp;10-K of Evergreen Energy&nbsp;Inc.:
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Based
on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements
made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>3.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Based
on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the
financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the company as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>4.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>The
company's other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act
Rules&nbsp;13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules&nbsp;13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f))
for the company and have:
<BR><BR></FONT>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(a)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Designed
such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that
material information relating to the company, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being
prepared;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(b)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Designed
such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to
provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting
principles;
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(c)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Evaluated
the effectiveness of the company's disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the
disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(d)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Disclosed
in this report any change in the company's internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the company's most recent fiscal quarter
(the company's fourth quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the company's internal control over financial reporting; and
<BR><BR></FONT></DD></DL>
</DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>5.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>The
company's other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the
company's auditors and the audit committee of the company's board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
<BR><BR></FONT>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(a)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>All
significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to
adversely affect the company's ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>(b)</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Any
fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the company's internal control over financial
reporting. </FONT></DD></DL>
</DD></DL>

<TYPE>EX-32.1
<SEQUENCE>11
<FILENAME>a2197697zex-32_1.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EXHIBIT 32.1
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
</HEAD>
<BODY BGCOLOR="#FFFFFF" LINK=BLUE  VLINK=PURPLE>
<BR>
<FONT SIZE=3 ><A HREF="#09ZEM48201_11">QuickLinks</A></FONT>
<font size=3> -- Click here to rapidly navigate through this document</font>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>


<!-- COMMAND=ADD_BASECOLOR,"Black" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DEFAULTFONT,"font-family:times;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_TABLESHADECOLOR,"#CCEEFF" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_STABLERULES,"border-bottom:solid #000000 1.0pt;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DTABLERULES,"border-bottom:double #000000 2.25pt;" -->




<!-- COMMAND=ADD_SCRTABLERULES,"border-bottom:solid #000000 1.0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;" -->





<!-- COMMAND=ADD_DCRTABLERULES,"border-bottom:double #000000 2.25pt;margin-bottom:0pt;" -->


</FONT></P>

<!-- TOC_END -->
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="km48201_exhibit_32.1"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_km48201_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>  Exhibit&nbsp;32.1    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B> EVERGREEN ENERGY&nbsp;INC.  </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B> CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO 18 U.S.C. SECTION&nbsp;1350,<BR>
AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO SECTION&nbsp;906<BR>
OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF&nbsp;2002  </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>I,
Thomas H. Stoner, Jr., state and attest that: </FONT></P>

<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>1.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>I
am the Chief Executive Officer of Evergreen Energy&nbsp;Inc. (the "Issuer"),
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Accompanying
this certification is the Form&nbsp;10-K for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2008, a periodic report (the "Periodic Report")
filed by the Issuer with the Securities and Exchange Commission pursuant to Section&nbsp;13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (the "Exchange Act"), which contains financial
statements.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>3.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>I
hereby certify, pursuant to 18 U.S.C. Section&nbsp;1350, as adopted pursuant to Section&nbsp;906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that based on my
knowledge: </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2>
<BR><BR></FONT>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>&#149;</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>the Periodic Report containing the financial statements fully complies with the requirements of Section&nbsp;13(a) or
Section&nbsp;15(d) of the Exchange Act; and  </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2>
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>&#149;</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>the information contained in the Periodic Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and
results of operations of the Issuer for the periods presented therein. </FONT></DD></DL>
</DD></DL>
 <DIV style="padding:0pt;position:relative;width:80%;margin-left:10%;">
<p style="font-family:times;"><font size=1></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>


<!-- COMMAND=ADD_TABLEWIDTH,"100%" -->


 </FONT></P>

<TD WIDTH="12pt" style="font-family:times;"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="22pt" style="font-family:times;"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="12pt" style="font-family:times;"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="" style="font-family:times;"></TD>
<!-- TABLE COLUMN WIDTHS END --></TR>

<TR VALIGN="BOTTOM">
<TD VALIGN="TOP" style="font-family:times;"><BR><FONT SIZE=2> /s/&nbsp;THOMAS H. STONER, JR.<BR>


<HR NOSHADE SIZE="1.0pt" WIDTH="100%" COLOR="#000000">

</FONT> <FONT SIZE=2> Thomas H. Stoner, Jr.<BR>
Title: </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>President&nbsp;&amp; Chief Executive Officer</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
Date: March&nbsp;31, 2010</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>

 </DIV>
 <P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>A
signed original of this written statement required by Section&nbsp;906 has been provided to Evergreen Energy&nbsp;Inc. and will be retained by Evergreen Energy&nbsp;Inc. and furnished to the
Securities and Exchange Commission or its staff upon request. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="RIGHT" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="ko48201_exhibit_32.2"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_ko48201_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>  EXHIBIT 32.2    <BR>    </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B> EVERGREEN ENERGY&nbsp;INC.  </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER" style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2><B> CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO 18 U.S.C. SECTION&nbsp;1350,<BR>
AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO SECTION&nbsp;906<BR>
OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF&nbsp;2002  </B></FONT></P>

<P style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>I,
Diana L. Kubik, state and attest that: </FONT></P>

<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>1.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>I
am the Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of Evergreen Energy&nbsp;Inc. (the "Issuer"),
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>2.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>Accompanying
this certification is the Form&nbsp;10-K for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2008, a periodic report (the "Periodic Report")
filed by the Issuer with the Securities and Exchange Commission pursuant to Section&nbsp;13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (the "Exchange Act"), which contains financial
statements.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>3.</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>I
hereby certify, pursuant to 18 U.S.C. Section&nbsp;1350, as adopted pursuant to Section&nbsp;906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that based on my
knowledge: </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2>
<BR><BR></FONT>
<DL compact>
<DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>&#149;</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>the Periodic Report containing the financial statements fully complies with the requirements of Section&nbsp;13(a) or
Section&nbsp;15(d) of the Exchange Act; and  </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2>
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT style='font-family:times;margin-bottom:-11pt;'><FONT SIZE=2>&#149;</FONT></DT><DD style="font-family:times;"><FONT SIZE=2>the information contained in the Periodic Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and
results of operations of the Issuer for the periods presented therein. </FONT></DD></DL>
</DD></DL>
 <DIV style="padding:0pt;position:relative;width:80%;margin-left:10%;">
<p style="font-family:times;"><font size=1></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>
